command: xyz=$(echo _target_ | unfurl domains) && ffuf -se -t 40 -fc 404 -maxtime 7200 -rate 400 -v -timeout 20 -H "User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:109.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/117.0" -w _wordlist_ -u "_target_/FUZZ" -o \$xyz.json -od \$xyz -of json ; if [ -f \$xyz.json ]; then ffufPostprocessing -result-file \$xyz.json -bodies-folder \$xyz -delete-bodies -overwrite-result-file ; sudo rm -r \$xyz ; jq -r ".. | .url? // empty" \$xyz.json | tee -a output ; go clean -cache -modcache ; sudo rm \$xyz.json ; fi ; if [ -d /tmp ]; then sudo rm -rf /tmp/* ; fi
